location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 300 x 250mm, on sheet 365 x 275mm

mods.abstract: The rough sketch map shows the Ajer [Aker] inlet on the Persian Gulf, in the region of El Hasa [Al-Hasa, or Al-Aḥsāʾ, in what is now Saudi Arabia].It includes brief descriptions of topography and water depth.The map bears the printing statements ‘I.B. [Intelligence Branch] Topo. Dy. No. 1,847. Exd. C. J. A., February 1897.’, ‘(Sd.) J. A. D., 27-7-96.’ and the reference number ‘No. 1,178-I., 96.’
